actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the act of August 24, 1935 (commonly referred to as the "Miller Act") to provide for additional protection to persons supplying labor and material in the prosecution of work provided for in contracts for the construction, alteration, or repair of any public building or public work of the United States.

summary.text: Repeals the specified bond amounts in the Miller Act with respect to required surety bonds for public construction contracts. Retains the requirement that such bonds be provided for the protection of all persons supplying labor and material in connection with such contract.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act of August 24, 1935 (commonly referred to as the "Miller Act") to provide for additional protection to persons supplying labor and material in the prosecution of work provided for in contracts for the construction, alteration, or repair of any public building or public work of the United States.
